Posts.EditableText: Hi I have a problem it may seem hopefully very easy to sort without going into coding, cause I'm totally a drip when it comes to understanding it.Right at the moment my background is dark grey and the object text is default blue and they do not match. So is there any way to change at all, the object text that is. For instant You can see a [u:zidxpc77]key[/u:zidxpc77] and a [u:zidxpc77]bar[/u:zidxpc77] Many thanks in anticipation
Posts.HTML:
Hi I have a problem it may seem hopefully very easy to sort without going into coding, cause I'm totally a drip when it comes to understanding it.Right at the moment my background is dark grey and the object text is default blue and they do not match. So is there any way to change at all, the object text that is.
For instant
You can see a key and a bar

Many thanks in anticipation

Posts.EditableText: Have you checked the Text formatting page in QuestWiki? http://quest5.net/wiki/Text_formatting It might help. [i:33b104uc]If[/i:33b104uc] it doesn't provide much help to you, try changing the hyperlink color.
Posts.HTML:
Have you checked the Text formatting page in QuestWiki?

http://quest5.net/wiki/Text_formatting

It might help.

If it doesn't provide much help to you, try changing the hyperlink color.

Posts.EditableText: Thanks a million red tulip I would never have thought that hyperlinks would have meant that with the show objects. But it sorted it. I am terrible for skipping through instructions I miss all the important bits. Once again thanks, have good day. May you always walk with peace in your heart and fortune in your step
